results.title: Simvastatin, an HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor, reduced the expression of matrix metalloproteinase-9 (Gelatinase B) in osteoblastic cells and HT1080 fibrosarcoma cells.
results.text_hl: In this study, we proposed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces @GENE_MMP9 @GENE_4318 @@@MMP-9@@@ expression in osteoblasts and @CELLLINE_CVCL:0317 @@@HT1080@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005354 @@@fibrosarcoma@@@ cell line.

citations.NLM: Thunyakitpisal PD, Chaisuparat R. Simvastatin, an HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor, reduced the expression of matrix metalloproteinase-9 (Gelatinase B) in osteoblastic cells and HT1080 fibrosarcoma cells. J Pharmacol Sci. 2004 Apr;94(4):403-9. PMID: 15107580

results.title: Stabilization and translocation of p53 to mitochondria is linked to Bax translocation to mitochondria in simvastatin-induced apoptosis.
results.text_hl: In this study, we investigated the signaling pathways leading to apoptosis by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ induced cardinal features of apoptosis including increased DNA @DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@fragmentation@@@, disruption of mitochondrial membrane potential (MMP), and increased @GENE_CASP3 @GENE_836 @@@caspase-3@@@ activity by depleting @CHEMICAL_Terpenes @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013729 @@@isoprenoids@@@ in MethA @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005354 @@@fibrosarcoma@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Lee SK, Kim YC, Song SB, Kim YS. Stabilization and translocation of p53 to mitochondria is linked to Bax translocation to mitochondria in simvastatin-induced apoptosis. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2010 Jan 22;391(4):1592-7. PMID: 20043868
citations.BibTeX: @article{20043868, title={Stabilization and translocation of p53 to mitochondria is linked to Bax translocation to mitochondria in simvastatin-induced apoptosis.}, author={Lee SK and Kim YC and Song SB and Kim YS}, journal={Biochem Biophys Res Commun}, volume={391}, number={4}, pages={1592-7}}

results.title: Phosphorylation of eIF2alpha attenuates statin-induced apoptosis by inhibiting the stabilization and translocation of p53 to the mitochondria
results.text_hl: We previously reported that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ triggered the @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial@@@ apoptotic pathway in MethA @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005354 @@@fibrosarcoma@@@ cells, which was accompanied by the translocation of stabilized @GENE_TRP53_PS @GENE_22060 @@@p53@@@ to the mitochondria.

citations.NLM: Lee SK, Kim YS. Phosphorylation of eIF2alpha attenuates statin-induced apoptosis by inhibiting the stabilization and translocation of p53 to the mitochondria Int J Oncol. 2013 Mar;42(3):810-6. PMID: 23354132
citations.BibTeX: @article{23354132, title={Phosphorylation of eIF2alpha attenuates statin-induced apoptosis by inhibiting the stabilization and translocation of p53 to the mitochondria}, author={Lee SK and Kim YS}, journal={Int J Oncol}, volume={42}, number={3}, pages={810-6}}
